What are these people up to? You decide to follow them to the market. You follow the two workers to a strange looking market stall. The smell of a savory soup and something sweet seep out of the stand. Beyond the stand's table, a large purple curtain conceals the source of the smells.

The two workers from the docks go around the stall's desk, and behind the curtains of the market stand. You continue to watch the stall attentively. Then a man dressed in an odd purple suit emerges from the curtain, smiling in an uncomfortably welcoming way. The purple suited man looks around, seemingly for customers to the stand. It appears they are trying to sell some sort of food.

Go back to the boatOrder some food from the stand
